entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as the one who has a bleeding ear. He is described as hoisting himself upon his cushions.

entities.name: mad eye
entities.description: Mad Eye is mentioned in the conversation between Harry and George. It implies that Mad Eye might be related to the situation or issue at hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who bellowed 'I KNOW!' He seems to be involved in a conversation with George and feels beleaguered and blackmailed.

entities.name: cushions
entities.description: Cushions are mentioned as something that George is hoisting himself upon.

relationships.description: Harry and George seem to be having a conversation, with Harry bellowing 'I KNOW!' in response to something George said.
The mention of Mad Eye implies that the issue at hand is related to Mad Eye, and Harry seems to be aware of this connection.
